sections.about: Hi! My names Aaron and I'm a Calgary based software developer / engineering student. From an early age, my passion for engineering new things has been a driving force. Immersed in the world of coding, I crafted my skills and discovered innovative solutions. I am currently studying my Bachelor's Degree of Science in Engineering at the University of Calgary.
sections.projects: Here's some projects I've worked on, ranging from AI to Web Development.
sections.experience: Here's some of my past experiences.

experiences.title: Guitar Teacher
d: Provided personalized 1-on-1 guitar instruction to 30+ students of various skill levels, resulting in a 30% increase in student retention and satisfaction
Mentored students in improvisation skills, resulting in an increase of students' confidence and creativity in playing the guitar

experiences.title: Research Fellow, Project Manager
d: Researched cutting-edge technologies in AI, quantum computing, and biological robotics to develop innovative projects, resulting in a 20% increase in project completion rate compared to other accelerator participants.

Served as project manager of team of 5+ collaborators, winning 3+ hackathons and consultation challenges with industry leaders at Google and Microsoft contributing an increase in overall team success rates.

experiences.title: Software Developer, Backend Development Lead
d: Collaborated with a team of other enthusiastic students to develop and launch a full-stack real-time voting application using PostgreSQL, React, and Node.js
Led backend development team, collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate new API features.

experiences.title: Captain, MVP
d: Led the senior rugby team to multiple 20+ regular season, playoff, and tournament wins, demonstrating strong leadership qualities both on and off the field.

Fostered a culture of teamwork and camaraderie among 60+ team members, serving as a role model exemplifying dedication, discipline, and resilience in challenging situations during matches and training sessions.

experiences.title: High School Diploma
d: Senior Football Team, Captain of Senior Rugby Team
Student Of The Year 2024, 2023 (98% average grade)

projects.title: PrecisionFit
projects.d: An AI-driven personal trainer application using computer vision and neural networks.
projects.exd: Computer webcam analyses workout data, outputting accuracy metrics to help improve exercise form.

projects.title: Should boxing and MMA fans look to AI as judges?
projects.d: An article describing the viability of implementing computer vision and artificial intelligence technology as combat sport judges.
projects.exd: Explores a tech startup's computer vision technology, and details how to implement an unbiased AI.

projects.title: NestUp
projects.d: Nestup is the newest sensation in the world of mobile social media, offering a fresh, feature-rich platform for sharing life's special moments.
projects.exd: Nestup offers a space where friends and communities can engage and connect.

projects.title: Inspire
projects.d: Inspire is a social media platform designed to uplift and motivate users through positive and inspirational content.
projects.exd: Inspire aims to create a supportive online community where users can connect + learn about inspiring stories, quotes, movies, albums, and much, much more.

projects.title: Xenovation Labs
projects.d: An article proposing a solution to microplastics disrupting the marine environment, utilizing biological robots, Xenobots, to autonomously collect microplastics.
projects.exd: The article proposes a step by step process towards recovering microplastics, including the usage of apps, USV's.

projects.title: Connect Four AI
projects.d: An autonomous, unbeatable connect four AI utilizing the minimax algorithm.
projects.exd: This repo also includes an arduino option, allowing for the AI to be implemented on a real-life circuit.
